title: How To Get Over A Break-up
summary: Exercising is one of the best things you can do for yourself when you're going through a break-up. Indulging in your favourite TV show or movie can be a great way to get over your current emotions. Don’t let yourself fall into the temptation of stalking and haunting your ex because it’s only going to hurt you more in the long run. Write in a journal or diary to help you get to a place of peace after a breakup and remember that you are always in control of yourself.
